## User Verification using the Virtual National Identification Number (VNIN)

An endpoint to fetch and verify customer details using the Virtual National Identification Number (VNIN). It is a means of identification that contains robust information about an individual.


### Endpoint

POST `{{url}}/nigeria_kyc/lookup_vnin`

### Payload

```json
{
  "vnin": "AB012345678910YZ"
}
```

200 OK Response

```json

{
  "success": true,
  "statusCode": 200,
  "message": "Virtual National Identification Number details retrieved",
  "response_code": "00",
  "data": {
    "vnin": "AB012345678910YZ",
    "firstname": "John",
    "middlename": "Doe",
    "lastname": "Alamutu",
    "gender": "M",
    "mobile": "08012345678",
    "photo": "",
    "customer": "6bb82c41-e15e-4308-b99d-e9640818eca9"
  }
}
